
            <h1 class="postTitle">

    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">上周热点回顾（2.17-2.23）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>热点随笔：</p>
<p>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/thisiswhy/archive/2025/02/17/18720746.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">DeepSeek 解答了困扰我五年的技术问题。时代确实变了！</a>&nbsp;(<a rel="noopener">本地部署DeepSeek后，没有好看的交互界面怎么行！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">程序员晓凡</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jackyfei/archive/2025/02/17/18712595.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">为什么说在企业级应用开发中，后端往往是效率杀手？</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jackyfei/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">张飞洪[厦门]</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jyzhao/archive/2025/02/18/ppt-ge-mingdeepseekkimin-xiao-shi-gong-zuo5fen-zho.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">PPT革命！DeepSeek+Kimi=N小时工作5分钟完成？</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jyzhao/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">AlfredZhao</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/du-hong/archive/2025/02/18/18721304.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">What？废柴， 还在本地部署DeepSeek吗？Are you kidding？</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/du-hong/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">北京-宏哥</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/aser1989/archive/2025/02/19/18723717.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">为DeepSeek添加本地知识库</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/aser1989/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">ASER_1989</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/zh94/archive/2025/02/18/18720633.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">DeepSeek企业级部署实战指南：从服务器选型到Dify私有化落地</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/zh94/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">陈咬金</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/liuliu-66/archive/2025/02/21/~why-tracebit-is-written-in-c-sharp.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">[翻译] 为什么 Tracebit 用 C# 开发</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/liuliu-66/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">六六的博客</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jinjiangongzuoshi/archive/2025/02/17/18719470.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">推荐一个DeepSeek 大模型的免费 API 项目！兼容OpenAI接口！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jinjiangongzuoshi/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">狂师</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/dnboy/archive/2025/02/21/18728746.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deepseek官网太卡，教你白嫖阿里云的Deepseek-R1满血版</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/dnboy/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">卷福同学</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/codelove/archive/2025/02/17/18719305.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">趁着过年的时候手搓了一个低代码框架</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/codelove/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">雪雁</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/dennyzhangdd/archive/2025/02/18/18721660.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">程序员转型AI：行业分析</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/dennyzhangdd/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">只会一点java</a>)</p>
